Intervention: Letrozole, 2.5 mg daily for six months
Eligibility: Testimony of hyperplasia with/without atypia during random aspiration of the fine peri-areolar needle from the breast
Increased risk of developing breast cancer based on personal or family history
Never taken aromatase inhibitors or oestrogen receptor selective modulators in the last six months
Women at high risk of breast cancer
• Pregnant women or within 12 months of breastfeeding/birth
Results: Change in the proliferation of breast epithelial cells obtained by aspiration of random periareolar needles.
Assessment of immunocytochemical proliferation using Ki-67. Expressed as a percentage of positive cell coloration for Ki-67.
Description of the arm/group: Letrozole, 2.5 mg per day for six months
Unit of measure: % change in positive cells for Ki-67 -2.3 (-21.0 to 7.8)
